channel.title: CVE Feed for MediaWiki -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaWiki -- all products

item.title: CVE-2013-1817|2024-08-06T15:13:32.994Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: MediaWiki before 1.19.4 and 1.20.x before 1.20.3 contains an error in the api.php script which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2013-1816|2024-08-06T15:13:33.186Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: MediaWiki before 1.19.4 and 1.20.x before 1.20.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) by sending a specially crafted request.

item.title: CVE-2012-0046|2024-08-06T18:09:17.356Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: mediawiki allows deleted text to be exposed
